PURPOSE : Phase II trial study effectiveness combine gefitinib celecoxib treat patient non-small cell lung cancer refractory platinum-based chemotherapy ( cisplatin carboplatin ) .
DOC.brief_title: Gefitinib Celecoxib Treating Patients With Refractory Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine response rate patient platinum-refractory non-small cell lung cancer treat gefitinib celecoxib . Secondary - Determine progression-free overall survival patient treat regimen . - Determine toxicity regimen patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive oral gefitinib daily oral celecoxib twice daily day 1-28 . Treatment repeat every 28 day 3 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow 6 week . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 18-27 patient accrue study within 22 month .
